oai_dc:dc.dc:title: U.S. Model 1858 "bullseye" canteen
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: U.S. Model 1858 Union "bullseye" canteen made of tin. This was a standard variant of the U.S. canteen. The concentric rings were to give the canteen more strength. The sling looks to be original to the canteen. Manufacture's mark is partially visible on the spout.
